attributes.action: Open the Science Museum at Wroughton to the general public
attributes.background: The Science Museum has a large collection of items in hangers at Wroughton air base near Swindon, these cannot be seen by the general public, and I feel they should be able to view them.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This decision is the responsibility of the Science Museum Group, which is operationally independent.
